name: X-Sports
description: The legend of the dragon and the princess needs you to experience it. Press and hold the left mouse button, and then release it to complete the jumping action. The longer you press it, the farther the jumping distance will be. If you successfully jump from one platform to the next, the player can get a certain amount of points and launch an attack on the dragon. Knock the dragon out of the map and pass the level successfully. Points can be used to buy resurrection and powerful attack items.
